metadata.Title: CVE-2017-11539 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: When ImageMagick 7.0.6-1 processes a crafted file in convert, it can lead to a Memory Leak in the ReadOnePNGImage() function in coders/png.c.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> 0125-CVE-2017-11539-coders-png.c-Initialized-quantum_info.patch in unstable 0253-CVE-2017-11539-Fix-memory-leak-in-convert-ReadOnePNGImage.patch in wheezy not fixing memory leak in trusty and xenial

criterions.comment: imagemagick: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
